thread.title: Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Offers Comfortable Lodging for Lake Guntersville Bass Tournaments
thread.title_full: Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Offers Comfortable Lodging for Lake Guntersville Bass Tournaments - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Offers Comfortable Lodging for Lake Guntersville Bass Tournaments
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro, AL offers comfortable lodging for Lake Guntersville bass tournaments in September 2015.
 SCOTTSBORO, AL, September 01, The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama hotel offers comfortable lodging for September bass tournaments on Lake Guntersville. The Alabama Bass Federation State Championship is scheduled for September 18-19. The BFL Choo Choo Division tournament will take place on September 26-27. Both events will operate from the Goose Pond Colony Marina in Scottsboro.
"We look forward to welcoming guests fishing in upcoming bass tournaments on Lake Guntersville," shares Debra Luke, General Manager of the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro. "Our award winning hotel is just 7 miles from Goose Pond Colony Resort," comments Ms. Luke.
This popular hotel near downtown Scottsboro has plenty of boat trailer parking spots with weatherproof charging stations. The 81 non-smoking guest rooms and King Suites feature a microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Guests will enjoy a restful night's sleep on Clean and Fresh Hampton Beds . The delicious Hampton on the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is complimentary. Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bags are available on weekday mornings. The refreshing outdoor pool is the perfect place for travelers to relax. Hotel amenities include a fitness center, business center, and Pavilion Pantry Market. The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro recently received the Lighthouse Award, the highest honor for Hampton properties, as well as the TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence.
This Scottsboro AL hotel is close to area attractions including Unclaimed Baggage, Buck's Pocket State Park, and Hampton Cove Golf Course on Alabama's Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail. Current lodging specials include the Shop and Drop Package, with discounts from Unclaimed Baggage, and Book Early and Save 15%. AAA, senior, and military rates are available. HHonors members will earn points toward free hotel nights.
For information about the Alabama Bass Federation tournament, visit www.albassfed.org . To register for the BFL Choo Choo Division tournament, visit www.flwfishing.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro, call (256)259-5200 or visit their website at www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com .
About Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama Hotel
The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro hotel in Alabama is located in the mountain/lakes region of northern Alabama surrounded by majestic mountains and rich valleys, located minutes from Lake Guntersville. Whether in town for business or pleasure, Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro has been designed with your comfort in mind, from boat parking to complimentary high-speed Internet access; your comfort is their main goal. Each of the hotel's spacious rooms and suites features the Clean & Fresh Hampton bed, mini refrigerator, microwave, work desk, basic cable plus HBO, and 37 inch flat panel TV.
For more information visit: http://www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
